article: Mrs. Brown is from London in England, but she likes  _  in China. She says her students all work very  _  and they are very friendly. She loves  _  very much. Mrs. Brown  has  a son and a daughter. Her son's name is Jack. He is ten. Her daughter's name is Sue. She is seven  years  old. They study in China. They don't have classes  _  weekends. They  _  their school very much. After school, they often  go  shopping or play sports. They help their mother  _  some housework sometimes. They have a happy  _  .
